Form package: label, button input, checkbox, slider...Â¶

Form package: label, button input, checkbox, slider...

  • Abstract form widget: base for every form widget
  • Form button: button for Form
  • Form checkbox: a simple checkbox
  • Form: a form container
  • Form input: one-line text input
  • Form label: A text-label with align support
  • Form slider: a slider based on MTSlider + MTLabel
